thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com | 40 3
thread.title: Davide Caporale
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Davide Caporale

author: Davide Caporale
title: Davide Caporale
text:
I bought an action cam (SJ5000X Elite) with 30% of discount. This action cam is high quality product and I'm very happy of this purchase.
TomTop offers a great choose of goods and an easy way to choose the country of warehouse in order to select best price and short distance for best delivery.
Very userfriendly interface and many payments accepted.
For me is the number one for shopping online.
